en: My heart is fixed, O God; I will sing, yea, I will sing praises, even with my glory.
hmr: Aw Pathien, ka lungril hi adet a nih; Hla sak ka tih, anih, inpâkna hla sak ka tih, ka ropuina ngeiin.

en: Awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake right early.
hmr: Perkhuong le ṭingṭanghai, har ro, Kei chu zîngkâr har ka tih.

en: I will give thanks unto thee, O Jehovah, among the peoples; And I will sing praises unto thee among the nations.
hmr: Aw LALPA, mi tin laiahai chun lâwmthu hril ka ti cheh a, Hnam tin laia chun nangma inpâkin hla sak ka tih.

en: For thy lovingkindness is great above the heavens; And thy truth reacheth unto the skies.
hmr: I ngilneina chu vân khûm khawpin a nasa sih a, I thutak chun vân dumhai khi a tawng hiel bawk a.

en: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens, And thy glory above all the earth.
hmr: Aw Pathien, nang chu vân khûm dai khin chawimawiin hung um la, I ropuina chu hnuoi chung po poa hin chawimawiin um bawk raw se.

en: That thy beloved may be delivered, Save with thy right hand, and answer us.
hmr: I dittakhai hi sanhima an um theina dingin, I kut changtiengin sandam la, mi hung dawn rawh.

en: God hath spoken in his holiness: I will exult; I will divide Shechem, and mete out the valley of Succoth.
hmr: Pathienin a înthiengnaa chun hieng ang hin a hril a, “Hlimtakin, Sekem khuo chu sem ka ta, Sukkoth ruom chu semdar bawk ka tih.

en: Gilead is mine; Manasseh is mine; Ephraim also is the defence of my head; Judah is my sceptre.
hmr: Gilead chu ka ta a na, Manasse ka ta a na; Ephraim khawm chu ka lu humhimna a na; Judai chu ka lalhmawl a nih.

en: Moab is my washpot; Upon Edom will I cast my shoe; Over Philistia will I shout.
hmr: Moab chu kân sâwpna bêl a na, Edoma chun ka kekawk pei ka ta, Philistin chu khêk khum ka tih,” tiin.

en: Who will bring me into the fortified city? Who hath led me unto Edom?
hmr: Khawpui kul neia chun tuin am mi ṭhuoi lût a ta? Edoma chun tuin am mi ṭhuoi a ta?

en: Hast not thou cast us off, O God? And thou goest not forth, O God, with our hosts.
hmr: Aw Pathien, nangma ngeiin i mi thlauthlâk a ni naw am a nih? Aw Pathien, kan sipaihai kuoma hlak i suok ve ta si nawh a.

en: Give us help against the adversary; For vain is the help of man.
hmr: A mi dotuhai thaw dingin mi ṭhangpui la, Mihriem ṭhangpuina chu teplo mei mei a ni sih a.

en: Through God we shall do valiantly: For he it is that will tread down our adversaries.
hmr: Pathien zârah huoitakin thâwng ei tih, Ama chu a mi dotuhai sir detu ding a ni sih a.
